QueryResult.text: SELECT INV_INVESTMENTS.ID , INV_INVESTMENTS.NAME , INV_INVESTMENTS.CODE , INV_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION , INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_ACTIVE , INV_INVESTMENTS.CREATED_DATE , INV_INVESTMENTS.CREATED_BY , INV_INVESTMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE , INV_INVESTMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_BY , INV_PROJECTS.TYPE , INV_PROJECTS.STAGE_IDENTIFIER , INV_PROJECTS.IS_PROGRAM , NLS_UPPER(ODF_CA_INV.ODF_OBJECT_CODE) , INV_PROJECTS.IS_TEMPLATE , INV_INVESTMENTS.PURGE_FLAG , INV_PROJECTS.IS_REVENUE_PLAN FROM INV_INVESTMENTS , INV_PROJECTS , ODF_CA_INV WHERE INV_INVESTMENTS.ID = INV_PROJECTS.PRID(+) AND INV_INVESTMENTS.ID = ODF_CA_INV.ID
